title: Blue Box
desc:
Post 2420
- Has an different effect based on what round in the game this card was played.
Round 1: Gives you 2 **Muscle.** ðŸ’ª
Round 2: Makes you draw a <:ex:1118578840529281114> card, even if it would be impossible for it to do so.
Round 3: **Injures** a random player that is not you. Gives 1 **Gloom** to a player that is not you.
Round 4: Makes you draw a <:holy:1120560132150022184> card, even if it would be impossible for it to do so.
Round 5: Gives you 20 ðŸ’µ .
Round 6, 7, 8, or 9: Immediately draw 2 <:trinket:1141745128898310144> **Trinkets.** they gain **Phantom.**
Round 10: Everyone draws a <:blue:1106234079055200378> card, and then a <:arcana:1141474382905094215> card, and then 2<:blue:1106234079055200378> cards, and then 2 <:arcana:1141474382905094215> cards, and then 3 <:blue:1106234079055200378> cards.
Round 11, 12, or 13: Nothing.
Round 14: Posts the **Moving Box** in <#1106231378443505785>. If it has already done this, draw the **Moving Box.**
Round 15 or 16: Nothing.
Round 17: Gain 1 **Muscle** and draw a <:black:1106265022453268530> card. It gains **Phantom.**
Round 18, or 19: Nothing.
Round 20: Gain 1 **Shield** and draw a <:white:1107514189574045726>  card. It gains **Ethereal.**
Round 20-25: **Spotlight** (game modifier two) the color <:blue:1106234079055200378> for 5 rounds.
Round 26+: Nothing.
